import React,{useState} from 'react' import useStyles from './styles' import {TextField,Button,Paper,Typography} from '@material-ui/core' import FileBase from 'react-file-base64' export default function Form() { const [postData,setPostData]=useState({creator:'',title:'',message:'',tags:'',selectedFile:''}) const classes=useStyles() return (
Creating a memory setPostData({...postData,creator:e.target.value})}/> setPostData({...postData,title:e.target.value})}/> setPostData({...postData,message:e.target.value})}/> setPostData({...postData,tags:e.target.value})}/>
setPostData({...postData,selectedFile:base64})}/>
